name: Homemade Pizza Meat
author: Becky Essner
instructions: Brown meat and drain. Again, add the seasonings to taste and cook over low heat for about 2 to 3 more minutes. Sprinkle meat over sauce. May also add pepperoni slices, slivers of onion, sliced green peppers, mushrooms, olives and other toppings. Top with cheese. Bake in preheated 425Â° oven for 20 to 25 minutes.
